name: rabet
description: Rabet extension, a simple way to interact with Stellar network.

scripts.install-all: npm run install-popup && npm run install-background && npm run install-interaction
scripts.prod-all: npm run prod-popup && npm run prod-background && npm run prod-interaction
scripts.release: npm run prod-all; mkdir ../$BUILD; cp -r `ls -A | grep -v src` ../$BUILD

author: alper95polat@gmail.com
